Plot: Three backpackers head to a Slovak city that promises to meet their hedonistic expectations, with no idea of the hell that awaits them.
Title: Hostel
Actors: Jay Hernandez, Derek Richardson, Eythor Gudjonsson, Barbara Nedeljakova
tomatoConsensus: Featuring lots of guts and gore, Hostel is a wildly entertaining corpse-filled journey -- assuming one is entertained by corpses, guts, and gore, that is.
Language: Czech, German, Russian, Japanese, Slovak, English, Icelandic, Dutch, Spanish
Country: USA, Germany, Czech Republic, Slovakia, Iceland
